Name: Adith
Profession: Software Developer
About: Adith is a dedicated full-stack developer with a passion for building scalable web applications and innovative solutions. He is skilled in JavaScript, Python, and modern web technologies.
Projects: Developed e-commerce platforms, chatbots, and data analytics tools. Constantly working on personal projects to refine his skills.
Interests: Learning new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, and solving real-world problems with code.
